trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" /> that can be used to obtain context information.
trans-unit.target: 可用于获得上下文信息的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> that represents the property being queried.
An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem" /> objects containing the UI items associated with the property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem" />，它包含与该属性相关联的 UI 项。

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that adds a delegate to an implementation of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.IPropertyValueUIService" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示向 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.IPropertyValueUIService" /> 的实现添加委托的方法。

trans-unit.source: When this delegate is invoked, it can add a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem> containing UI items for the specified property to the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> passed as the `valueUIItemList` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 当调用此委托时，它可以将添加<xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem>包含到指定的属性的 UI 项<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>作为传递`valueUIItemList`参数。

trans-unit.source: This following code example demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIHandler> event handler method that provides <xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem> objects for any properties named `HorizontalMargin` or `VerticalMargin`.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIHandler>提供的事件处理程序方法<xref:System.Drawing.Design.PropertyValueUIItem>任何名为的属性的对象`HorizontalMargin`或`VerticalMargin`。
